title: Havent been credited for any of the VOD's or Live stream event rewards
body:
I haven't been credited for any of the rewards given for watching vods on https://watch.oce.lolesports.com

This has been going on since worlds, perhaps even earlier. Every time I watch a vod or tune in to a live stream, it says at the bottom via a notification that my account is setup correctly to receive rewards, but I'm yet to actually get any. Is this a glitch?

I'm currently watching the LPL and been watching various other live events during the week and still haven't received that stupid Foam Finger of Desstiny, what gives? Wouldn't mind the system actually working zzzzz

replies.body:
If anyone gets stuck with this like I did, there's some more information here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001976407-Esports-Watch-Missions

Nothing on that list helped me however, but it might help you! 

Tonight I'm testing out a different browser to see if that makes a difference.
